1066440.name: Yggdrasil
1066440.description:
Nameless Worlds is an open-world sandbox game with procedural generated, fully destructible landscape.

For a simple start. This open-world is ready to be shaped by your bare hands.
Though this game is low on feautures, it is already captivating in the way you can shape the landscape as you see fit.
The current block that, for now, is buildable in this world is a piece of floor but it can easily be used as a ceiling, wall, bridge and for nerd-poling.

Features

  • Procedural Generated World
  • Completely Modifiable Environment
  • Currently 1 building material
  • Harvestable trees and stones
  • Running speed
  • Walk speed
  • Jumping
